content.raw:
When you reset the timer the tf published afterwards will have an older timestamp than the one published before resetting time. So this error will continue until time has passed past the time you had before resetting time.

I see this as more of a user error than gazebo or ROS error given that you seem to want to reset time which naturally screws up a system depending on continuous timestamps. ;) 

If you want to reset simulation but not time then this is related to [gazebo issue 507](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/507/issues-with-reset-buttons)
